title: Practice Challenge: Refactoring with Destructuring
description: Refactor the following verbose code to use modern destructuring and spread patterns. The functionality should remain exactly the same, but the code should be much cleaner.
instructions:
Convert the old-style code to use:
- Object destructuring for extracting properties
- Array destructuring for extracting elements
- Spread operator for copying and merging
- Function parameter destructuring

hints.text: For object destructuring with rename: let { oldName: newName } = obj;
For function parameter defaults: function fn({ prop = defaultValue }) {}

commonMistakes.consequence: Variable name conflicts with existing code
commonMistakes.correction: Use { name: userName } syntax when needed

commonMistakes.mistake: Missing default value in function parameter
commonMistakes.correction: Use { prop = default } in the parameter destructuring
